Setting Default Album Art

If you have songs that don't have a specific piece of album art, you can define a default image url using the "default_album_art" key. Once again, this is handled on initialization.

    Amplitude.init({
        "songs": [
            {
                "name": "Song Name 1",
                "artist": "Artist Name",
                "album": "Album Name",
                "url": "/song/url.mp3",
                "cover_art_url": "/cover/art/url.jpg"
            },
            {
                "name": "Song Name 2",
                "artist": "Artist Name",
                "album": "Album Name",
                "url": "/song/url.mp3",
                "cover_art_url": "/cover/art/url.jpg"
            },
            {
                "name": "Song Name 3",
                "artist": "Artist Name",
                "album": "Album Name",
                "url": "/song/url.mp3",
                "cover_art_url": "/cover/art/url.jpg"
            }
        ],
        "default_album_art": "/url/to/default.jpg"
    });
